verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

This is the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> thee a <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H6510>heifer<s%> without <S%H8549>spot<s%>, wherein is no <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, and upon which <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> her unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and he shall bring her <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and one shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> her before his <S%H6440>face<s%>:

and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5227>toward<s%> the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>.

And one shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H6510>heifer<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>; her <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and her <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and her <S%H1818>blood<s%>, with her <S%H6569>dung<s%>, shall he <S%H8313>burn<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> - <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H231>hyssop<s%>, and <S%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer<s%>.

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And he that <S%H8313>burneth<s%> her shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And a <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H622>gather<s%> up the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer<s%>, and lay them <S%H3240>up<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; and it shall be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%>: it is a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And he that <S%H622>gathereth<s%> the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>: and it shall be unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2708>them<s%>, for a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
He that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%> of any <S%H120>man<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

the same shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself therewith on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>: but if he <S%H2398>purify<s%> not himself the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, then the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall not be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

Whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%>, the body of a <S%H120>man<s%> that hath <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H2398>purifieth<s%> not <S%H2930>himself<s%>, defileth the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: because the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> was not <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> upon <S%H2931>him<s%>, he shall be unclean; his uncleanness is yet upon <S%H2932>him<s%>.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> when a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in a <S%H168>tent<s%>: every one that <S%H935>cometh<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%>, and every one that is in the <S%H168>tent<s%>, shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
And every <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, which hath no <S%H6781>covering<s%> <S%H6616>bound<s%> upon <S%H2931>it<s%>, is unclean.

And whosoever in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> one that is <S%H2491>slain<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, or a dead <S%H4191>body<s%>, or a <S%H6106>bone<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>, or a <S%H6913>grave<s%>, shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And for the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H6083>ashes<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>; and <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> shall be <S%H5414>put<s%> thereto in a <S%H3627>vessel<s%>:

and a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H231>hyssop<s%>, and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it upon the <S%H168>tent<s%>, and upon all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and upon the <S%H5315>persons<s%> that were <S%H5060>there<s%>, and upon him that touched the <S%H6106>bone<s%>, or the <S%H2491>slain<s%>, or the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, or the <S%H6913>grave<s%>:

and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> person shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> upon the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> <S%H3526>him<s%>; and he shall wash his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>.

But the <S%H376>man<s%> that shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>, and shall not <S%H2398>purify<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%>, that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, because he hath <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> hath not been <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> upon <S%H2931>him<s%>; he is unclean.

And it shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> unto <S%H5137>them<s%>: and he that sprinkleth the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until <S%H6153>even<s%>.

And whatsoever the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> person <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until <S%H6153>even<s%>.
